name: Impresja
description: Impresja is an exploration game taking place in a dynamic, non-Euclidean world that can be reconfigured by player through manipulation of art pieces.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 2 or later Processor: Dual Core 2 Ghz SSE2 instruction set support. Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) with 384 MB VRAM ( 512 MB Recommended ) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 240 MB available space
